oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Burning Memories - Ray Price performance - 1963-12-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Burning Memories, written by Mel Tillis and Wayne Walker, produced by Don Law and Frank Jones, recorded on December 18, 1963 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, Tenn., and performed by Ray Price (vocals), Jerry Kennedy (guitar), Grady Martin (guitar), Buddy Emmons (steel), Joe Zinkan (bass), Will Ackerman (drums), Tommy Jackson (fiddle), and Hargus Robbins (piano).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: "Burning Memories" sheet music booklet [typed] and [Cedarwood Publishing letterhead] Song pitch letter dated 1968-07-11 and addressed from John Denny to Eddy Arnold [handwritten] stored with transcription documents, Box 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tillis, Mel; Walker, Wayne, 1925-1979; Law, Donald F., 1902-1982; Jones, Frank, 1928-2005; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Kennedy, Jerry, 1940-; Martin, Grady, 1929-; Emmons, Buddy; Zinkan, Joe; Ackerman, Will, 1949-; Jackson, Tommy; Robbins, Hargus; Cedarwood Publishing Company
